price: 22. Comme ne sauraient être égaux, non plus, les morts et les vivants. Allah fait entendre qui Il veut, tandis que toi tu ne pourras faire entendre ceux qui sont dans les tombes.
arabic: وَمَا يَسۡتَوِي ٱلۡأَحۡيَآءُ وَلَا ٱلۡأَمۡوَٰتُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُسۡمِعُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ بِمُسۡمِعٖ مَّن فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wamā yastawī al-aḥyāu walā al-amwātu inna al-laha yus'miʿu man yashāu wamā anta bimus'miʿin man fī al-qubūri
